alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:52AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Garvin, central Carter and Murray Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1251 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wynnewood to 6 miles southeast of Hennepin to near Wilson. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Pauls Valley, Sulphur, Davis, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wynnewood, Wilson, Stratford, Springer, Elmore City, Katie, Dougherty, Graham, Pooleville, Lake Of The Arbuckles, Turner Falls, Hennepin, Milo, and Whitebead. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 35 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
